alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:10PM CDT until July 08 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN ELLIS...NORTHERN ROGER MILLS AND SOUTHWESTERN DEWEY COUNTIES... At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Angora, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Arnett, Leedey, Crawford, Durham and Angora. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
